sample_docs: Cutting-edge Facial Recognition technology meets privacy-by-design Discover why we stand out as one of the industry's safest facial recognition companies. Committed to safeguarding personal data whilst empowering you to deliver a safer environment for your customers and team. Benefits Designed and built with privacy and compliance at its core We are proud that our services and products have, since day one, been designed in a manner that strives to exceed the requirements of UK GDPR and many other security or operational regulations. THE FAICETECH SOLUTION Live, Matching, Retrospective Search & Access Control Facial Recognition Solutions on Edge, Server & Cloud. Move forward with confidence: We place compliance and privacy at the forefront of our facial recognition technology, ensuring both cutting-edge solutions and unwavering protection of individual rights and data security. We are fully committed to the UK General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and are happy to discuss all our policies and processes. Benefits The Benefits of working with FaiceTech Our proprietary technology and process enables us to deliver a high level of accuracy whilst utilising bank level security to ensure data is stored and accessed securely. Unlike others, our privacy and security by design paradigm means we are the only UK service provider that has always met or exceeded all expectations. Honest We will not allow automated decisions to be made with a legal or similar effect, without their appropriate human verification. Unique We provide innovative, tailor-made solutions, enhancing efficiency and results with cutting-edge technology. Secure We will not allow the data that we process to be used for any other processes... It's your data, not ours. TRANSPARENT Each client must demonstrate consultation with key stakeholder groups, or appropriate justifications as to why not with certain groups. Proven We will not knowingly profile minors or vulnerable persons and we are committed to upholding strict ethical standards and legal regulations to ensure the protection of minors' privacy and rights. "Since implementing the FaiceTech System, we've seen tangible results and reduced known loss. After testing various options, we chose FaiceTech for its accuracy, ease of implementation, and excellent support. It complies with UK Facial Recognition regulations and has become an invaluable tool for alerting our stores to known offenders, enabling proactive theft prevention. The system easily integrated with our existing security systems, helping build a deterrent culture. I highly recommend FaiceTech and their team for delivering exactly what we needed. Facial Recognition Systems will soon become as accepted as CCTV in crime detection and prevention." Grocery Retailer Loss Prevention & Security Manager "Increasing incidents of abusive behaviour towards shop workers is a worrying trend. Colleagues' safety is our paramount priority – this initiative is helping us to achieve a safer workplace for our colleagues and a nicer environment for our customers to shop." Grocery Retailer Head of Business Risk FACIAL RECOGNITION SOLUTIONS: EMPOWERING COMPLIANCE, ENSURING SECURITY. Our operations span the globe, reaching from continent to continent. We are currently extending our reach and illuminating future pathways for the widespread implementation of our Facial Recognition Solutions. Move Forward With Confidence We place compliance and privacy at the forefront of our facial recognition technology, ensuring both cutting-edge solutions and unwavering protection of individual rights and data security. We are fully committed to the UK General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and are happy to discuss all our policies and processes. Faice Alert Get alerted within seconds when a threat enters your properties. A highly secure, cloud-based architecture makes it easy to integrate our technology into your CCTV estate. You could be up and running in less than a day. Running on a secure private network, our facial recognition services can send configurable notifications via multiple channels including SMS and Email. You manage your own watch list. You can tag data subjects to ensure alerts are relevant and supportive. Our Pixail cloud platform ensures the right alerts get to the right people with just enough information to ensure sensitive, timely decisions can be made. Find out more Benefits of working with FaiceTech Our proprietary technology and process enables us to deliver a high level of accuracy whilst utilising bank level security to ensure data is stored and accessed securely. Unlike others, our privacy and security by design paradigm means we are the only UK service provider that has always met or exceeded all expectations. We will not allow automated decisions to be made with a legal or similar effect, without their appropriate human verification. We will not knowingly profile minors and we are committed to upholding strict ethical standards and legal regulations to ensure the protection of minors' privacy and rights. Each client must have a justifiable and proportionate lawful basis for all processing, that we have vetted, ensuring that data processing activities align with best practices in data privacy and protection. Each client must demonstrate consultation with key stakeholder groups, or appropriate justifications as to why not with certain groups. We will not allow the data that we process to be used for any other processes... It's your data, not ours. retrospective Facial Recognition FaiceMatch has various investigative APIs that can integrate with your existing system. FaiceMatch is an ID and Selfie comparison tool for remote Know- Your-Customer (KYC) Validation. It is an easy to integrate API based facial recognition solution that safeguards businesses against fraud. Find out more access control solution Introduce an unmatched level of security to your premises by employing access control hardware and strategically placed wall and ceiling mounted cameras. Embrace a truly exceptional form of access – your biometrics, one of the most distinctive 'keys' at your disposal. Find out more ANPR Automatic Number Plate Recognition (or ALPR - Automatic Licence Plate Recognition) – License plate and vehicle identification. Detect & deter vehicle related crimes by integrating our cloud-based, secure technology into your existing CCTV estate. Operating 24x7x365 the FaiceTech ANPR service is a low-cost, bolt-on solution. Your IT team will love the simplicity and security. Your security team will love the extra peace-of-mind. Compliance We take pride in our Privacy by Design approach here are FaiceTech. It reflects our commitment to prioritising the protection and privacy of personal data from the outset of our technology's design and implementation. Data Protection Approach FaiceTech have gained a considerable amount of experience and practical knowledge related to facial recognition data protection compliance in many different scenarios in many different territories around the world. We are well versed in providing the benefits of this specialist knowledge to clients to assist them with their own data protection compliance responsibilities.​ This specialist knowledge of data protection compliance with regards to processing biometric data for facial recognition processes has led FaiceTech to develop a set of red lines and areas of critical guidance for clients, which can be applied in consultation with new clients to assist their fast development of their own compliant processes and policies. OPERATIONAL PROCESSES OUR PLATFORM IS DESIGNED FOR SECURITY MULTIPLE LAYERS OF FIREWALL INTRUSION DETECTION TWO-FACTOR AUTHENTICATION DATA ENCRYPTION AT REST & IN-TRANSIT DATA SEPARATION / ISOLATION WEEKLY VULNERABILITY TESTING Accreditations and regulatory certifications We are proud that our organisation and solutions have been designed in a manner that strives to exceed the requirements of UK GDPR, and we are also compliant with these other information security and operational international standards. DEFINING COMPLIANCE Applying new technology to existing environments and behaviours can yield huge productivity gains, however if the ethics or protections of individual data rights are not considered diligently then these productivity gains can come at a cost – to both the individuals and the organisation.​ When processing biometric data adhering to data protection legislation is non-negotiable, but this can prove difficult to determine at the outset. However, there is a growing library of guidance from the ICO in the UK with regards to the compliant processing of biometric data that organisations can refer to.​ APPLYING THE 7 CORE PRINCIPLES OF UK GDPR UK GDPR outlines 7 core principles that are set out right at the start of the legislation and inform everything that follows. Compliance with the spirit of these key principles is therefore a fundamental building block for good data protection practice. It is also key to your compliance with the detailed provisions of the UK GDPR.​ With the deployment of facial recognition technologies, most of these principles refer to how an organisation choses to interact with its data subjects, with the principles of transparency, accuracy, integrity, accountability and purpose limitation being at the forefront of planning processes and creating key internal policies.​ However, compliance with some of these core principles requires the solution that an organisation adopts to be designed to with privacy in mind, such as data minimisation, accuracy, storage limitation and confidentiality. ASSISTING CLIENTS WITH DATA PROTECTION FaiceTech have adopted a Privacy by Design approach to the development of all our solutions, ensuring that the features required to enable a client organisation to operate compliantly are built in and configurable.​ FaiceTech have also gained a considerable amount of experience and practical knowledge related to facial recognition data protection compliance in many different scenarios in many different territories around the world. As a result FaiceTech are well versed in providing the benefits of this specialist knowledge to clients, to assist them with their own data protection compliance responsibilities.​ This specialist knowledge of data protection compliance with regards to processing biometric data for facial recognition processes has led FaiceTech to develop a set of red lines and areas of critical guidance for clients, which can be applied in consultation with new clients to assist their fast development of their own compliant processes and policies. DATA PROTECTION | GDPR | PRIVACY There's no denying that the use of computer algorithms to process CCTV camera feeds is a sensitive subject. At FaiceTech we understand these concerns and attempt to address your questions below. Artificial Intelligence We only deploy independently tested and approved algorithms that are pre-trained by AI – no further training or learning occurs after deployment. AI DECISION MAKING Our systems do not make automated decisions about individuals, but they do make highly accurate comparisons between facial templates which will always be presented to a human for final verification before a client decides what action to take. DATA SEPARATION We provide separated instances of our technology for each of our clients and do not aggregate third party data from other sources, allowing clients to have full control over the data processing we carry out on their behalf, and giving them the peace of mind of knowing that the only data we process for them is subject to their strict processes alone. Racial Bias Our algorithms undergo rigorous testing to minimise all types of bias, after being trained with bias-free datasets, ensuring accuracy and fairness by using diverse datasets and continuous performance evaluation. The DPIA Before any service goes live, we assist each client in completing an extensive Data Protection Impact Assessment. IMPORTANCE OF SECURITY Cybersecurity is crucial when deploying facial recognition technology and processing special category data due to the sensitive nature of biometric information. FaiceTech have put in place s strong cybersecurity framework, which is essential to safeguarding against data breaches, unauthorised access, and identity theft, ensuring protection for individuals' privacy and organisational​ compliance. IMPORTANCE OF USING A HIGH RESOLUTION CAMERA High-resolution cameras are essential for facial recognition, capturing fine details that enhance identification accuracy, even in challenging conditions. They also enable building robust watchlists by capturing and storing high-quality images directly from the camera feed, reducing errors and enhancing security in critical applications. COMPLIANCE OVER COST SAVING When choosing a facial recognition provider organisations should prioritise compliance over cost, as ensuring data privacy and legal adherence is of paramount importance to maintaining trust and upholding ethical standards in the use of this technology. ​ CUTTING EDGE FACIAL RECOGNITION, MEETS PRIVACY BY DESIGN We take pride in our Privacy by Design approach here are FaiceTech. SOLUTIONS FaiceTech's suite of products can be deployed as solutions to a number of problems, in numerous sectors CHOOSING A SOLUTION THAT ALIGNS WITH YOUR REQUIREMENTS Whether you're considering the flexibility of Cloud solutions, the control of Server-based systems, or the innovative intelligence of Axis On-Edge Camera solutions, we provide comprehensive insights to help you make an informed decision. Each option offers unique advantages tailored to different operational requirements. Explore our detailed comparisons and expert recommendations to determine which solution best aligns with your business goals, ensuring enhanced efficiency, security, and scalability. CLOUD | SERVER | EDGE A different solution, for your business requirements... CLOUD FaiceTech's cloud-based solutions represent the cutting edge in facial recognition technology, delivering robust, scalable, and secure systems. Designed to meet the diverse needs of modern enterprises, our solutions are built with a focus on precision, compliance, and user convenience. Featuring advanced deep learning algorithms, our systems ensure accurate identity verification, seamless integration, and user-friendly operation. Enhanced security measures, including encryption and spoofing prevention, safeguard data. Compliance with global privacy regulations is prioritised, offering transparency. Real-time monitoring, cost-effectiveness, and customisable options make our solutions future-ready and adaptable to unique needs, ensuring continuous innovation and top-tier security. is cloud right for you? Cost Efficiency Cloud services eliminate the need for extensive on-site infrastructure, reducing maintenance costs and capital expenditure, while offering predictable subscription-based pricing. Accessibility With cloud-based systems, you can access your data and applications securely from anywhere, at any time, using any internet-enabled device, promoting flexibility and remote working. Security Leading cloud providers invest heavily in robust security measures, including data encryption, regular updates, and compliance with industry standards, ensuring your data is well-protected. Scalability Cloud solutions can easily scale up or down based on your needs, ensuring you only pay for what you use without the need for significant upfront investments in hardware. Disaster Recovery Cloud solutions often include comprehensive disaster recovery options, providing automated backups and quick restoration capabilities, minimising downtime and data loss. Collaboration Cloud platforms facilitate seamless collaboration, allowing multiple users to work simultaneously, improving productivity and team efficiency. SERVER At FaiceTech, we redefine the standards of server-based or on-premise solutions with our cutting-edge technology and unparalleled service. Scalability Server solutions can handle a large number of cameras and higher resolution video feeds, making them ideal for expansive surveillance networks and growing systems. Processing Power Servers typically offer greater computational resources compared to edge devices, allowing for more complex and resource-intensive analytics and processing tasks. Cloud Connected Centralised Management Optional with server solutions, administrators can manage from a single, centralised location, simplifying maintenance and upgrades. Low Bandwidth Support for low bandwidth sites enables the compute to be done locally and optionally synchronised with cloud services. Integration Flexibility Server-based systems can more easily integrate with other locally deployed enterprise systems and databases, facilitating comprehensive security solutions. EDGE FaiceTech, an industry leader in cutting-edge surveillance technology, proudly introduces its latest innovation onboard the Axis Communications Camera. Seamlessly integrating with Axis Communications world-renowned IP cameras, FaiceTech's advanced edge solutions bring unparalleled intelligence to video surveillance. These solutions leverage AI-driven analytics directly on the camera, providing real-time alerts and enhancing security measures. From precise facial recognition to proactive threat detection, FaiceTech ensures robust and efficient monitoring. Ideal for various environments, including smart cities, retail, and critical infrastructure, FaiceTechs' edge-based solutions redefine the future of intelligent surveillance. IS EDGE RIGHT FOR YOU? Real-Time Processing On-edge camera solutions process data directly on the device, enabling immediate analysis and response without latency, crucial for time-sensitive security applications. Reduce Bandwidth Usage By processing data on the camera itself, these solutions minimise the need to transmit large video files over the network, conserving bandwidth and reducing operational costs. Enhanced Privacy On-edge processing ensures that sensitive data is analysed and stored locally, reducing the risk of data breaches during transmission and enhancing overall privacy and compliance with data protection Scalability With processing capabilities embedded in each camera, expanding your surveillance network becomes straightforward and cost-effective, without the need for extensive server infrastructure. Reliability On-edge solutions operate independently of network conditions, maintaining functionality and recording capabilities even during network outages or disruptions. Energy Efficiency By distributing processing tasks across multiple devices rather than relying on central servers, on-edge camera solutions can lead to more efficient energy usage and lower overall power consumption. Cloud services eliminate the need for extensive on-site infrastructure, reducing maintenance costs and capital expenditure, while offering predictable subscription-based pricing. With cloud-based systems, you can access your data and applications securely from anywhere, at any time, using any internet-enabled device, promoting flexibility and remote working. Leading cloud providers invest heavily in robust security measures, including data encryption, regular updates, and compliance with industry standards, ensuring your data is well-protected. Cloud solutions can easily scale up or down based on your needs, ensuring you only pay for what you use without the need for significant upfront investments in hardware. Cloud solutions often include comprehensive disaster recovery options, providing automated backups and quick restoration capabilities, minimising downtime and data loss. Cloud platforms facilitate seamless collaboration, allowing multiple users to work simultaneously, improving productivity and team efficiency.
